PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01942018-03-06AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) can continue to perform its mandated activities and contribute to its strategic outcome - ‘Canada’s grain is safe, reliable, marketable and Canadian grain producers are protected’ (2) set fair and consistent fees that reflect the costs associated with providing CGC services and licences; and (3) update the fees of the Commission set out in Schedule I of the Regulations to keep them current by establishing fees that come into effect April 1, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0033 Publication Date: 2018-03-21
AttachmentsAttachment
